play_help:
```apache
cy/play <YouTube link>
The link should only be from YouTube

<> - required```
queue_help:
```apache
cy/queue [clear/next/skip/loop/remove]

cy/queue clear will completely clear the queue and delete playback files
cy/queue next/skip next/skip will skip the current track and start playing the next one. Doesn't work if there's only one track in queue
cy/queue loop will loop the current queue
cy/queue remove <track position in queue> will remove the track from queue, cannot be used on first position

[] - optional, <> - required, / - or```
roulette_help:
```apache
cy/roulette [@mention/name/ID/leaderboard]

Cigarettes - restores one health point
Hand saw - the next shell will deal twice as much damage
Beer - you rack the shotgun
Magnifying glass - you get the current shell in the chamber
Handcuffs - the player who puts them on skips the next turn
Burner phone - the answering one will slightly reveal the future
Expired medicines - 50% chance to gain 2 health points or lose one
Inverter - the current shell is changed to the opposite: live -> blank, blank -> live
Adrenaline syringe - you can choose one opponent's item and use it immediately, except for the syringe itself
Linken Sphere - you block one directed item: handcuffs, inverter and adrenaline syringe
At the start of the game, you will be offered to switch to a different channel

[] - optional
Bot requires permissions - manage channels```
timeout_help:
```apache
cy/timeout <@mention/name/ID> [reason]

[] - optional, <> - required, / - or
Required permissions - manage channels
Bot requires permissions - timeout users```
deaf_help:
```apache
cy/deaf <@mention/name/ID> [reason]
Unlike the `mute` command, Bot will deafen people in the voice channel with the **Deafened** role

[] - optional, <> - required, / - or
Required permissions - manage channels
Bot requires permissions - manage roles```
undeaf_help:
```apache
cy/undeaf <@mention/name/ID> [reason]

[] - optional, <> - required, / - or
Required permissions - manage channels
Bot requires permissions - manage roles```
roll_help:
```apache
cy/roll [from/1d20] [to]
cy/roll 80 (0-80)
cy/roll 26 90 (26-90)
cy/roll (0-100)
cy/roll 1d6

If [to] isn't specified, [from] will become [to]
Maximum number of edges and dice - 20
Number of edges is not tied to physical dice variants
When rolling dice, do not specify [to]
[] - optional, / - or```
ban_help:
```apache
cy/ban <@mention/name/ID> [reason/--soft --reason]
cy/ban 185476724627210241 --soft --reason 1.5
cy/ban @сасиска bad guy
cy/ban 'Sgt White' --soft

When using --soft, it is necessary to specify --reason after it, however, it is possible to not use --reason
[] - optional, <> - required, / - or
Required permissions for both bot and executor - ban members```
content_help:
```apache
cy/content <ID> [message channel] [--edit]

This command will output the full content of the message, so you can quickly copy the requested message while preserving all formatting
If applied to a message with an embed, it will return the content of some fields, including description, title, footer, image links, and color
In the case of bot messages, it will return the content in the format cy/say *what needs to be written to repeat the requested message*
It fully works with embeds from Bot, but embeds from other sources will be incomplete
The `--edit` argument will return the message in the format cy/edit *message ID* *what needs to be written to repeat the requested message*

[] - optional, <> - required```
clear_help:
```apache
cy/clear <amount> [range] [word filter]
cy/clear 10
cy/clear 50 --everyone 7
cy/clear 30 --bots
cy/clear 15 --users
cy/clear 5 --silent
cy/clear 200 '--silent --everyone'

--everyone will delete every message
--bots will delete only bot messages
--users will delete only `human` messages
--silent will not show the results of the message deletion. Note that if confirmation is required, it will still be shown
If an unknown argument is specified, all arguments will be ignored
When specifying a filter, you must write exactly what is written in the message - the command is case-sensitive

When specifying a range, the number of messages that will be deleted is not the number specified, but rather the number of messages that will be found within the specified range
Example: cy/clear 10 --bots
If messages from bots and humans are alternating, only the number of bot messages found within the specified range of 10 will be deleted. This is intentional, but may be changed in the future

Messages older than 2 weeks will not be deleted immediately - this is a limit of the Discord API
When deleting more than 100 messages, confirmation from the server owner is required
Only the server owner can delete up to 250 messages at a time
No more than 300 messages can be deleted at a time!

[] - optional, <> - required, / - or
Required permissions: administrator
Bot requires permissions: manage messages```
dm_help:
```apache
cy/dm <@mention/name/ID> <text>

<> - required, / - or
Note that the bot may not send a message if a person has private messages closed
Required permissions - check audit log```
say_help:
```apache
cy/say [text] [&t title text] [&d description text] [&th right image link] [&img bottom image link] [&f footer text] [&c HEX color] [&msg text above embed] [&b label text | url link]
cy/say &t Title &d Description
cy/say [text]
cy/say &b label FunClub P-sune | url https://discord.gg/rDR4SSt
All arguments are optional

[] - optional```
edit_help:
```apache
cy/edit <ID> [text] [&t title text] [&d description text] [&f footer text] [&c HEX color] [&th right image link] [&img bottom image link] [&b label text | url link]
cy/edit <ID> [text]
cy/edit <ID> --clean
cy/edit <ID> --noembed
cy/edit <ID> --delete

--clean will delete the content above the embed
--noembed will delete the embed
--delete will delete the message

Using --clean and --noembed at the same time is not possible
If a message has an embed and no arguments are provided in the command, &msg will be automatically replaced
The title, description, and color will be taken from the old embed if it exists and these arguments are not specified
To clear any field, specify the argument and leave it empty, for example: cy/edit <ID> &d will empty the description

[] - optional, <> - required
Required permissions - manage messages```
give_help:
```apache
cy/give <@mention/name/ID> <@role/role name/role ID> [<@role/role name/role ID>...]
You can specify multiple roles

<> - required, / - or
Required permissions - manage channels```
kick_help:
```apache
cy/kick <@mention/name/ID> [reason]

[] - optional, <> - required, / - or
Required permissions for both bot and executor - kick members```
mute_help:
```apache
cy/mute <@mention/name/ID> [reason]

[] - optional, <> - required, / - or

Bot requires permissions - manage roles```

cy/take <@mention/name/ID> <@role/role name/role ID> [<@role/role name/role ID>...]
You can specify multiple roles

<> - required, / - or
Required permissions - manage channels

```apache
cy/unmute <@mention/name/ID> [reason]

[] - optional, <> - required, / - or
Required permissions - manage channels
Bot requires permissions - manage roles```

kick_member_top_gt_author: {author_mention}, your top role is lower than {member_mention}'s top role

give_role_eq_author_top: You can't give {role_mention} to anyone because it is equal to your top role

give_role_eq_bot_top: **My** top role is {role_mention}. Can't give the role
take_role_gt_author_top: You can't take {role_mention} because it is higher than your top role
take_role_eq_author_top: You can't take {role_mention} because it is equal to your top role
take_role_gt_bot_top: **My** top role is lower than {member_mention}'s top role
take_role_eq_bot_top: **My** top role is equal to {member_mention}'s top role
mute_member_has_role: The Muted role is already in the member's role list
mute_member_top_eq_author_top: {author_mention}, your top role is equal to {member_mention}'s top role
mute_member_top_gt_author_top: {author_mention}, your top role is lower than {member_mention}'s top role
timeout_member_top_eq_author_top: {author_mention}, your top role is equal to {member_mention}'s top role
timeout_member_top_gt_author_top: {author_mention}, your top role is lower than {member_mention}'s top role
deaf_member_has_role: The Deafened role is already in the member's role list
deaf_member_top_eq_author_top: {author_mention}, your top role is equal to {member_mention}'s top role
deaf_member_top_gt_author_top: {author_mention}, your top role is lower than {member_mention}'s top role
undeaf_member_has_no_role: Undeafing is not needed. Deafened role not found in the member's role list
undeaf_no_role: {author_mention}, I can't undeaf {member_mention} because the Deafened role has been removed
unmute_member_has_no_role: Unmuting is not needed. Muted role not found in the member's role list
unmute_no_role: {author_mention}, I can't unmute {member_mention} because the Muted role has been removed
play_video_age_restricted: This video may be inappropriate for some users. Downloading cancelled
play_video_country_restricted: This video is not allowed in Russia. Downloading cancelled
play_video_downloading_error: I can't download this video. Try again later
play_already_in_use: Music is already playing in another channel
not_in_voice_channel: You must be in a voice channel to use `{command}`
diff_channel: You must be in the same channel as me!
join_already_in_author_voice_channel: I am already in your voice channel!
join_already_connected: I'm already being used in another channel!
leave_already_not_connected: I'm already not in a channel!
queue_remove_first: You cannot remove the first track
queue_remove_no_such_track: There is no such track in the queue
roulette_play_invite: You have been invited to play Russian roulette! To accept, press `Yes`, you have 30 seconds ||to decline, press `No`||
roulette_rules_vs_user:
A random number of shells from 2 to 8 is loaded into the magazine.
A shell can be live or blank.
Before each round, you receive random items in the amount of two, up to a maximum of 8 items.
__To speed up the game, starting from round 5, players will receive 4 items__.
Using an item is considered an additional action and does not affect the turn order.
You __cannot__ cancel item usage.
The number of both live and blank shells is completely random but not zero.
The game ends when one player's health reaches zero.
Maximum number of rounds is 10.
If you shoot yourself with a blank, the opponent skips a turn.
Turn order and health amount will be decided by a coin toss
roulette_rules_vs_bot:
A random number of shells from 2 to 8 is loaded into the magazine.
A shell can be live or blank.
Before each round, you receive random items in the amount of two, up to a maximum of 8 items.
__To speed up the game, starting from round 5, players will receive 4 items__.
Using an item is considered an additional action and does not affect the turn order.
You __cannot__ cancel item usage.
The number of both live and blank shells is completely random but not zero.
The game ends when one player's health reaches zero.
Maximum number of rounds is 10.
If you shoot yourself with a blank, the opponent skips a turn.
Since you are playing against a bot, the human always goes first in the round
roulette_stalemate: Game ended in a draw, the channel will be deleted in 10 seconds
roulette_game_stopped: The game was stopped by the player, the channel will be deleted in 10 seconds
roulette_winner: Game over. {winner} won, the channel will be deleted in 10 seconds
roulette_round_number_is_5: Round number {i}, now you will receive 4 items
roulette_use_more_often: {player}, items were not added as you have 8. Use items more often
roulette_items_disabled: Items were disabled for this game
roulette_cuffed: is cuffed and skips the next turn
roulette_chose_opponent: You chose to shoot the opponent
roulette_shoot_self_blank: Blank, the opponent skips a turn
roulette_shoot_self_live: It was live.. You lose health in the amount of {damage}
roulette_shoot_opponent_live: It was live, the opponent loses {damage} health

roulette_handcuffs_stolen: You stole the handcuffs, the dealer will skip the next turn
